TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IdentityConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义 Windows 标识基础行为控件的配置属性集合。

span.span: Defines the collection of configurable properties controlling the behavior of the Windows Identity Foundation.

summary.span: 从应用程序或 Web 配置文件加载 实例的设置。

span.span: Loads the settings for this instance from the application or Web configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有配置文件，如果命名部分不存在，或者如果 `element` 为 `null` ，则不会引发异常; 而是使用一组默认值加载实例。If there is no configuration file, if the named section does not exist, or if `element` is `null`, then no exception is thrown; instead the instance is loaded with a set of default values. 此方法调用 方法来加载标记处理程序配置。This method calls the method to load the token handler configuration.
